LevelEditorToolbar.Description: Collection of commands providing quick access to tools and operations.

Sections.Title: ToolbarPanel
Sections.Description: Provides quick access to tools and operations.

Commands.Description: Shortcuts for adding and opening content.
Open Settings menu for selection, editing, and previewing options.
Access options to create or edit Blueprints.
Create a new level or master sequence.
Start the game in play mode with Play Options menu.
Launch current map on supported platforms.

Sections.Title: BottomToolbar
Sections.Description: Shortcuts to Command Console, Output Log, Derived Data, and source control status.

Commands.Description: Debugging tool for printing application information.
Enter console commands for specific editor behaviors.
Connect to or assign Source Control solution.

QuickSettings.Description: Configure selection, editing, and preview in the Level Viewport.
QuickSettings.Menu: Settings menu in the Level Editor Toolbar controls selecting, editing, and previewing in the Level Viewport.

Options.Description: Select Actors with translucent Materials.
Selects the whole group when selecting an Actor in a group.
Actor must be completely within the selection box.
Selects objects occluded by other objects.
Toggles Transform widget visibility.
Controls fidelity of rendering features.
Sets Material quality level for previewing.
Sets rendering level used by the editor.
Controls volume of Level audio in realtime.
Actors snap to location of other Actors.
Sets distance for snapping.
Actors can snap to sockets.
Actors snap to nearest vertex on another Actor.
Actors snap to nearest location on constraint plane.
Hides Viewport toolbar and UI widgets.
Renders semi-translucent polygons for CSG brush faces.

Options.Option: Only Load Visible Levels in Game Preview
Options.Description: Loads only visible levels in game preview.
Uses distance LOD switching for particle systems.
Shows particle system helpers.
Freezes particle systems' simulation state.
Viewports use the same LOD.
Streams in levels automatically when the camera moves.

Outliner.Description: Hierarchical tree view of all Actors within the current Level for selection, attachment, and more.

Panel.Purpose: Displays all Actors within the scene in a hierarchical tree view.
Functions: Search and filter Actors by name, type, and other characteristics
Use advanced search operators to refine Actor searches
Panel.DefaultDock: Right side of the Unreal Editor window

Instances.Switching: Right-click the Outliner tab or go to Window > Outliner

ContextMenu.Description: Displays context menu for quick modifications.

Attach.Description: Attaches the Actor being dragged to another Actor.

Focus.Description: Focuses the selected Actor in the Viewport or Outliner.

SearchAndFilter.SearchBox: Search and filter Actors in the scene.
SearchAndFilter.DefaultSearch: Displays all Actors with a partial match to the search term.

AdvancedSearchOperators.Action: Excludes Actors that match a specific term.

SearchAndFilter.CustomFilters: Save and access custom filters globally across all streams and projects.

Outliner.Filters: Work similarly to Asset filtering in the Content Browser.

Columns.ContextMenu: Right-click column header to show/hide columns.
Columns.Resize: Left-click and drag edge of column header.

Customization.AlwaysFrameSelection: Toggles automatic scrolling to selected Actor in the Viewport.

MapCheckErrors.Description: Descriptions of errors generated during map builds or running a map check in Unreal Editor.
MapCheckErrors.Mechanism: Alerts you to potential problems in the form of map check errors and warnings.
MapCheckErrors.PerformingMapCheck: Displayed after a map build or via the Map Check option in the Level Editor Toolbar's Build menu.

Errors.Description: Critical problems that can cause execution failure.

Examples.Fix: Duplicate and replace the original with the new one.

Warnings.Description: Issues that may cause improper functionality or performance but are not critical.

Examples.Warning: [Actor] : Large Actor casts a shadow and will cause an extreme performance hit unless bUseBooleanEnvironmentShadowing is set to true
[Volume] causes damage, but has no damagetype defined.
Examples.Fix: Set the 'DamageType' property in the Actor's Property Window->Physics Volume.
Delete one of the Actors or disregard if intentional.
Change any DrawScale's that are zero to be non-zero.

Examples.Warning: [Actor] is obsolete and must be removed!
[Actor] bStatic true, but has Physics set to something other than PHYS_None!
[Actor] : Volume Actor has NULL collision component - please delete
[Actor] : Volume Actor has a collision component with 0 radius - please delete
[Actor] (LOD [Index]) has hand-painted vertex colors that no longer match the original StaticMesh [StaticMesh]
[Actor] has collision enabled but StaticMesh [StaticMeshName] has no simple or complex collision.
Examples.Fix: Set Collision Enabled to No Collision or add collision to the mesh.

Examples.Warning: Actor casts dynamic shadows and has a BoundsScale greater than 1!
Examples.Fix: Reduce BoundsScale or remove dynamic shadows.

Examples.Warning: [ActorName] has WorldTrace blocked. It will be considered to be world geometry

Warnings.Warning: [Brush Actor] : Brush has zero polygons - please delete!
Run 'Clean BSP Materials' to clear [count] references
[Actor] : Brush has NULL BrushComponent property - please delete!
Warnings.Fix: Delete the brush and create a new one.

Warnings.Warning: [Brush] : Brush is planar
Camera has AspectRatio=0 - please set this to something non-zero
Warnings.Fix: Set AspectRatio to a non-zero value.

Warnings.Warning: [ ]::[ ] is obsolete and must be removed (Class is abstract)
[ ]::[ ] is obsolete and must be removed (Class is deprecated)
Foliage instances for a missing Static Mesh have been removed.
Foliage in this map is missing [MissingCount] cluster component(s) for Static Mesh [MeshName]. Opening the Foliage tool will fix this problem.
[LandscapeComponent] : Fixed up deleted layer weightmap
[LandscapeComponent] : Fixed up incorrect layer weightmap texture index
Fixed up shared weightmap texture for layer [Layer] in component [Component] (shares with [Name])
Landscape ([ProxyName]) has overlapping render components at location ([X,Y])
Duplicate level info
Two WorldInfos somehow exist...
Map should have KillZ set.
Warnings.Fix: Specify a KillZ appropriate for the level.

Warnings.Warning: [Actor] : Light Actor has NULL LightComponent property - please delete!
Warnings.Fix: Delete the Light Actor and create a new one.

Warnings.Warning: Maps need lighting rebuilt
Component is a static type but has invalid lightmap settings! Indirect lighting will be black. Common causes are lightmap resolution of 0, LightmapCoordinateIndex out of bounds.
Paths need to be rebuilt
[Actor] : Emitter Actor has NULL ParticleSystemComponent property - please delete!
Warnings.Fix: Delete the Emitter Actor and create a new one.

Warnings.Warning: PSysComp has an empty parameter Actor reference at index [Index] ([Actor])
Param.Actor should not be NULL.
PSysComp has an empty parameter material reference at index [Index] ([Actor])
Param.Material should not be NULL.
[Actor] : SkeletalMeshActor has no PhysicsAsset assigned.
Warnings.Fix: Assign a PhysicsAsset to the SkeletalMeshComponent.

Warnings.Warning: [Actor] : Skeletal Mesh Actor has NULL SkeletalMeshComponent property
[Actor] : Skeletal Mesh Actor has NULL SkeletalMesh
[Actor] : Ambient sound Actor has NULL AudioComponent property - please delete!
Warnings.Fix: Delete the Ambient sound Actor and create a new one.

Warnings.Warning: Ambient sound Actor's AudioComponent has a NULL SoundCue property!
Warnings.Fix: Set the 'SoundCue' property in the Actor's Property Window->Audio Category->Audio Component.

Warnings.Warning: [Static Mesh Actor] : Static Mesh Actor has NULL StaticMesh property
Warnings.Fix: Set the 'StaticMesh' Property in the StaticMeshActor's Property Window->StaticMeshActor Category->StaticMeshComponent.

Warnings.Warning: [Actor] : Static Mesh Actor has NULL StaticMeshComponent property - please delete!
Warnings.Fix: Delete the Static Mesh Actor and create a new one.

Warnings.Warning: [StaticMesh] has simple collision but is being scaled non-uniformly - collision creation will fail
Warnings.Fix: Fix the scale or the collision type.

Warnings.Warning: More overridden materials [Count] on Static Mesh component than are referenced [Count] in source mesh [StaticMesh]
[Count] element(s) with zero triangles in Static Mesh [StaticMesh]
LevelGridVolumes are only allowed in the persistent level
Warnings.Fix: Move the LevelGridVolume to the persistent level.

Warnings.Warning: LevelStreamingVolume is not in the persistent level - please delete
Warnings.Fix: Delete and recreate the level streaming volume.

Warnings.Warning: No levels are associated with streaming volume.
Warnings.Fix: Associate one or more streaming levels with the LevelStreamingVolume.

Warnings.Warning: Filename [Filename] is too long - this may interfere with cooking for consoles. Unreal filenames should be no longer than [Length] characters.
Warnings.Fix: Rename the file to be within the specified length.

Warnings.Warning: [ObjectName] : Externally referenced

Infos.Description: Issues that do not need to be addressed but may be useful to know.
